info.title: Cisco-IOS-XE-lldp-oper
info.description:
This module contains a collection of YANG definitions
     for monitoring of Link Layer Discovery Protocol state information.
     Copyright (c) 2016-2017, 2019-2024 by Cisco Systems, Inc.
     All rights reserved.

Cisco IOS-XE operational state data (read-only).
**Category:** Interfaces & Layer 2
**Paths:** 10

**YANG Model:** [Cisco-IOS-XE-lldp-oper.yang](https://github.com/YangModels/yang/blob/main/vendor/cisco/xe/17181/Cisco-IOS-XE-lldp-oper.yang)

**📊 YANG Tree:** [View Cisco-IOS-XE-lldp-oper structure](https://jeremycohoe.github.io/cisco-ios-xe-openapi-swagger/yang-trees/Cisco-IOS-XE-lldp-oper.html)

get.description: The list of LLDP state entries
The list of LLDP interface entries (collection)
The list of LLDP interface entries
The list of LLDP interface entries (collection)
The list of LLDP interface entries

local-interface.description: Name of the local interface on the current device

connecting-interface.description: Name of the connected interface to 'local-interface'

is-drawing-power.description: Power is drawn from the device

ttl.description:
The time-to-live (TTL) is a mandatory TLV which
         indicates how long information from the neighbor should be
         considered valid

mau-type.description: Media attachment unit type for LLDP

local-efp-id.description:
Local EFP identifier of interface
          where the LLDP neighbour is learnt

is-drawing-power.description: Power is drawn from the device

hello-timer.description: Denotes the time between advertisement packets

system-name.description: Provides the name of the system

chassis-id-type.description:
Provides information about the subtype of
         chassis ID

frame-in.description: Denotes the number of input frames

frame-out.description: Denotes the number of output frames

frame-error-in.description: Denotes the number of input frames containing errors

frame-discard.description: Denotes the number of discarded frames

tlv-discard.description: Denotes the number of discarded TLVs

tlv-unknown.description: Denotes the number of unknown TLVs

mgmt-addr-type.description: Denotes the type of management ip address

platform-id.description: Provides information about the platform identifier

system-cookie.description:
Provides system cookie - the info string for
         an LLDP org specific TLV (Type=127, Subtype=1)

identifier.description: Provides information about the system generated id

port-id.description: Provides information about the port id

port-id-type.description: Provides information about the port id's type

port-desc.description: Provides information about the port's description

time-remaining.description: Specifies the timing of next advertisement

age.description: Denotes the age of the current state

time-since-last-update.description: Denotes the time since last update

peer-src-mac.description: Source MAC address from received LLDP packets

items.description: Advertised physical media capabilities of peer device

isenabled.description: provides state of LLDP on the interface

tx.description: LLDP transmission state on the interface

rx.description: LLDP reception state on the interface
